response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a symbol of quality and distinction. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $800,000. I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this masterpiece at a special price of $950,000. This opportunity is tailored for discerning individuals like yourself who appreciate the finer things in life and understand the true value of exceptional craftsmanship. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's anything else I can assist you with.", "product_price": 950000}
